Notify on drop: Notify the evaluation administrators when someone make a drop.
Participate in an evaluation requires au: Participate in an evaluation requires authentication. Please login.
Peer Review is starting in %dropzonename: Peer Review is starting in %dropzonename% Evaluation
Peer review evaluation: The learners will correct them. (Peer Review).
PeerReview_helper_ideal_case: In PeerReview mode, people will correct themselves without any help coming from the administrator only in a specific case where  the poeple number is equal to the number of required correction +1 or a multiple of this number.
PeerReview_helper_ideal_case_example: Example: if we have 2 expected corrections, the evaluation will be totally autonomous only in the specific case where we will have a number of participant equal to a multiple of 3. ( E1 correct E2 and E3, E2 correct E1 and E3, E3 correct E2 and E1).
PeerReview_helper_other_cases: In the other cases, the evaluation administrator will have to add some correction in order to finish the process.
PeerReview_helper_unlock_tool: Note: an unlock tool is available in order to avoid the admin to have to add many correction if a copy need more than one correction. This tool is only available if the dropzone is in peerReview mode and the evaluation status is set to closed.

Planification instruction: The opening of the evaluation can be done manually or automatically.
Planification peer review instruction: It is divided into several stages: the opening of the evaluation by allowing deposition early peer review that the deposit and closing the end of the evaluation

allowDropAndPeerReviewManualState: Learners can make their copy AND can correct copies (Peer Review).
common_explication:
This tool provides a space for students to file documents to be evaluated.
Corrections can be made by teachers, or by students themselves through peer review.
Planning tool allows you to manage the various phases of the evaluation, either manually or automatically by date.
corrections were already created: one: A correction was already  created.|some:%count% corrections were already created.
corrections_denied: Correction examiner have made that were reported
criteria_explication:
Please create here an evaluation form to be completed by the editors.
The number of criteria is not limited.
You can offer a free comment checker.
drop_info: Documents are automaticaly saved, but dont forget to click on the finish button when you have no more thing to add, if you dont, your copy will be like undelivered.
dropzone_startedNotValidatedYet_infos: Started but not validated drops are drop where people started to depose some files to the evaluation but had nevers clicked on the finished button. If you do nothing, they will be considered as not deposited.
expected_total_correction:
Three conditions are necessary for a student to valid his evaluation:
- He must have made ​​a copy.
- It must be corrected N other (s) copy (s).
- The copy must be received N correction (s).

A draw for a copy during a correction is made ​​randomly and anonymously.
finishedManualState: The evaluation is completed. No one can attend.
nb correction remains: one: You have one copy to correct to complete this evaluation.|some: You have %count% copies to correct to complete this evaluation.
nbDocumentsInThisEvaluation: one: You made a document for this evaluation:|some: You made %count% documents for this evaluation:
noCopyExpectedCorrection: one: No copy has received correction.|some: No copy has received the %count% correction expected.
notStartedManualState: The evaluation has not yet begun.
number_of_denied_corrections: Number of copy that the examiner have  reported
recalculate_helper: Usefull if you have deleted some criterias whereas people have already started to correct. This will adapt the note. If you added new Criteria, the note of this criteria will be 0.
unlock_user_tooltip: An unlocked user will be able to see his copy without doing the expected correction
